data.content: iDISCIPLE Philippines is a ministry that exists to bring glory to God by making gospel-centered disciples of all nations, starting with the local churches in the Philippines. We do this through conferences and training courses for the youth, young adults, pastors, and ministry workers.

data.title: CONTACT INFORMATION
data.content: 140 H.V. Dela Costa, Makati, Metro Manila, Philippines / Tel: +63 (02) 813-2203  /  Mobile: +63 917 809 4320  /  Email: info@idisciple.ph
